doc.field: Series III: Administrative is divided into seven subseries. Subseries A includes grant proposals, calls for proposals, resumes and other materials relating to obtaining professional appointments and work. Subseries B includes paperwork regarding artworks loaned by Andrea Callard. Subseries C includes financial information such as receipts and taxes. Subseries D contains information regarding Andrea Callard's participation in organizations, for example her work with LINE. Subseries E contains employment information for student interns who worked with Andrea Callard. Subseries F includes paperwork relating to Andrea Callard's day to day work as an artist such as notes, lists and research copies. Finally, Subseries G includes artist photographs. Subseries arranged chronologically where possible, alphabetically in other instances.
